content.question: The work required to accelerate an object from <math alttext="10 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> to <math alttext="20 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> is <math alttext="W sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>. The work required to accelerate the object from <math alttext="20 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> to <math alttext="30 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> is <math alttext="W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="W sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="W sub A is less than W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="W sub A equals W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="W sub A is greater than W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

The mass of the object must be known to compare the relative magnitudes of <math alttext="W sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="W sub A is less than W sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>W</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
